title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Label font size doesn't change immediately after modification in the UI.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label in the UI, the label height remains unchanged.
EB: Expected behavior is that when the font size of a label is modified in the UI, the label's height should adjust accordingly to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application with the label that needs its font size modified.
2. Navigate to the label's properties or settings.
3. Modify the font size to a different value.
4. Observe that the label's height remains the same and does not adjust to the new font size.
